title: Fear of the Unknown
description:
It’s obvious why people are afraid of things like spirits, ghosts, and goblins. It’s the fear of the unknown. That’s why we feel more comfortable around other human beings who live in our dimension. But when the unusual or even the evil masquerade as human beings, that is when we are really in danger, because we don’t even know we should be afraid. 

First, the outsider is already home
Followed by the dark side of superpowers
Then, friends till the deadly end
Finally in today's featured story, screaming for help but no one can hear
